articles.title: Apple iPad mini (2021) prices quietly went up yesterday - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The mini tablet costs the same as it did at launch in the US and Canada, but it suddenly got more expensive in Europe and Asia.
articles.content: The Apple iPad mini (2021) launched last year at $500 for the base 64GB model, the 256GB one was $650 was and still is, at least in the US. However, the prices in Europe and other regions have increa… [+3534 chars]

articles.title: France strikes over inflation, as refinery and railway workers walk out - The Washington Post
articles.description: Refinery and railway workers have walked out across France as many in Europe struggle with record inflation and an energy crisis.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Workers around France have walked out to demand better pay amid swirling warnings of a tough winter ahead in Europe. Many on the continent are struggling with record inflation … [+3503 chars]

articles.title: Rassie: Door always open for Elton, Zeenat back on tour - SARugbymag
